name: AugurFoundry
description: This is a factory that creates Wrappers around ERC1155 shareTokens generated by Augur.

eventDecorators.name: WrapperCreated
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal.

functionDecorators.name: newERC20Wrapper
functionDecorators.description: creates new ERC20 wrappers for a outcome of a market param _tokenId token id associated with a outcome of a market param _name a descriptive name mentioning market and outcome param _symbol symbol for the ERC20 wrapper param decimals decimals for the ERC20 wrapper.

functionDecorators.name: newERC20Wrappers
functionDecorators.description: creates new ERC20 wrappers for multiple tokenIds.

functionDecorators.name: unWrapTokens
functionDecorators.description: A function that burns ERC20s and gives back ERC1155s Requirements: * - msg.sender has more than _amount of ERC20 tokens associated with _tokenId. - if the market has finalized then it is advised that you call claim() on ERC20Wrapper contract associated with the winning outcome.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenId
parameterDecorators.description: token id associated with a outcome of a market.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: amount of tokens to be unwrapped.

functionDecorators.name: wrapTokens
functionDecorators.description: A function that wraps ERC1155s shareToken into ERC20s Requirements: * - msg.sender has setApprovalForAll to this contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenId
parameterDecorators.description: token id associated with a outcome of a market.

parameterDecorators.name: _account
parameterDecorators.description: account the newly minted ERC20s will go to.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: amount of tokens to be wrapped.
